attributes.action: Make parliamentary time available to debate men's issues
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the publication of a new report by the Institute of Economic Affairs revealing the gender pay gap to be a myth and apply only to women over 30 who have taken career breaks to become full-time mothers, parliamentary time should now be made available to discuss pressing issues affecting men, in particular their removal by the state from fatherhood roles through the tactics of the Child Support Agency and its successor agency
